---
id: link-a-conversation-to-crm
title: "Link a conversation to CRM"
description: "Links a conversation to the CRM entities. All the new mails will be added to the CRM history."
sidebar_label: "Link a conversation to CRM"
hide_title: true
hide_table_of_contents: true
api: 
sidebar_class_name: "put api-method"

custom_edit_url: null
---

import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Link a conversation to CRM"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/api/2.0/mail/conversations/crm/link"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Links a conversation to the CRM entities. All the new mails will be added to the CRM history.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"id_message":{"description":"ID of any message from the conversation","type":"integer"},"crm_contact_ids":{"description":"List of CRM entities in the following format: {entity_id: 0, entity_type: 0}.\n            Entity types: 1 - Contact, 2 - Case, 3 - Opportunity","type":"array","items":{"type":"object","title":"CrmContactData"}}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={undefined}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
